playActionCard() - Method in class objects.Controller

PlayerController - Class in objects
This class represents the Player controller operating on the board during a game.
PlayerController(PlayerProfile, int) - Constructor for class objects.PlayerController
Instantiates a new Player controller.
PlayerDatabase - Class in menu
The Player Database class handles the database and associated operations for a game board, storing the profiles of players and their scores.
PlayerDatabase(String) - Constructor for class menu.PlayerDatabase
Instantiates a new Player database.
PlayerProfile - Class in objects
The type Player profile stores data about a specific player profile.
PlayerProfile(String, int, int, int) - Constructor for class objects.PlayerProfile
Instantiates a new Player profile.
playerProfilesList - Variable in class menu.MenuController
